meanings.definition: To be a guest at a social event or gathering.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys guesting at parties and meeting new people.
meanings.sent2: They are guesting at the wedding next weekend.
meanings.sent3: Guesting at the dinner party, she accidentally spilled her drink.
meanings.sent4: His presence guesting at the event added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The idea of guesting at the exclusive gala excited her.

meanings.definition: The act of being a guest or staying as a guest.
meanings.sent1: His guesting at the hotel was comfortable and welcoming.
meanings.sent2: We appreciated her guesting during our family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The cat's guesting in the house made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her guesting at the party brought joy to all attendees.
meanings.sent5: The guesting at the resort was a pleasant experience for the family.

meanings.definition: The practice of inviting someone to be a guest on a show or program.
meanings.sent1: The guesting of celebrities on talk shows is common.
meanings.sent2: She was excited about her guesting on the morning show.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's guesting on the late-night program was hilarious.
meanings.sent4: His guesting on the cooking show surprised many viewers.
meanings.sent5: The guesting of experts on the podcast provided valuable insights.
